bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Developing Software Life Cycle Processes
IEEE Guide for Developing Software Life Cycle Processes

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Withdrawn Standard. Withdrawn Date: Jan 15, 2001. Selected topics covered in IEEE Std 1074-1995, IEEE Standard for Developing Software Life Cycle Processes, are addressed in this guide. The guide provides assistance with Software Life Cycle Model (SLCM) selection, Activity mapping, and management of a software Life Cycle (SLC).

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
